thread.title: The Galaxy S8 won’t be able to deal with the iPhone 8’s killer feature
thread.title_full: The Galaxy S8 won’t be able to deal with the iPhone 8’s killer feature

author: Chris Smith
title: The Galaxy S8 won’t be able to deal with the iPhone 8’s killer feature
text:
The Galaxy S8 is supposed to be officially unveiled in just over two weeks, but we already know everything there is to know about it thanks to the plethora of leaks that hit the web recently. But a new report explains why the Galaxy S8 will not be able to match its biggest rival this year when it comes to a brand new feature. 
Continue reading... 
Trending right now: 
There’s a new Google Pixel in stores, but it’s not the Pixel 2 Leaked images show the Galaxy S8’s software in intimate detail Despite imminent Galaxy S8 launch, now is the perfect time to buy a Galaxy S7
